verses.name: Psalms 51:12
verses.text: Restore unto me the joy of thy salvation; and uphold me with thy free spirit.

verses.name: Psalms 51:13
verses.text: Then will I teach transgressors thy ways; and sinners shall be converted unto thee.

verses.name: Psalms 51:14
verses.text: Deliver me from bloodguiltiness, O God, thou God of my salvation: and my tongue shall sing aloud of thy righteousness.

verses.name: Psalms 51:15
verses.text: O Lord, open thou my lips; and my mouth shall shew forth thy praise.

verses.name: Psalms 51:16
verses.text: For thou desirest not sacrifice; else would I give it: thou delightest not in burnt offering.

verses.name: Psalms 51:17
verses.text: The sacrifices of God are a broken spirit: a broken and a contrite heart, O God, thou wilt not despise.
